-e ---

𓌉

wḥyt

𒁕𒈾 da-na day "watch" ≈ 12 * 2 hours
1 day = 12 watches of 30 géš 𒐕 = 360 𒄑 geš degrees ⇔ 𒐞 1 GEŠU
1 watch = 30 géš of 12 hands = 360 manu minutes ⚠️ 12*360 = 4320 hands per day
1 geš = 12 hands of 30 grains = 360 seconds = 60 finger = 3 foot = 2 cubit
1 hand = 30 grains

Aries ♈ 𒀯𒇽𒂠𒂷 mul-lu2-hun-ga2 "hired man" 𒇻 LU Sheep
Taurus ♉ 𒀯𒄞𒀭𒈾 mul-gu4-an-na "Bull of Heaven"
Gemini ♊ 𒀯𒈧𒋰𒁀𒃲𒃲 mul-maš2-tab-ba.gal.gal "Great Twins" Rooster
Cancer ♋ 𒀯𒀀𒇻 mul-a-lu "Crab"
Leo ♌ 𒀯𒌨𒄖𒆷 mul-ur-gu-la "Lion"
Virgo ♍ 𒀯𒀳 mul-absin 𒀳 ᶠURU "Furrow" @ Virgo ≈ vereǧo ≈ 𒀳 ᵛerešu₄
Libra ♎ 𒀯𒍥𒁀𒀭𒈾 mul-zi-ba.an.na 𒂟 ṢÂB ṣāb 𒂟 sig₅ 𒀸𒂟 Ζυγόν Zugón 𓍝 scale
Scorpius ♏ 𒀯𒄈𒋰 ˢĝir₂bi #Zuqaqīpu 𓋴 𓂋 𓈎 𓏏 𓆫 •Zuqarpīu "empty"
Sagittarius ♐ 𒀯𒉺𒉈𒂵 mul-pa.bil.ga "Anchestor" Pabilsag Anzu-bird
Capricorn ♑ 𒀯𒋦𒈧𒆪 mul-suhur-maš2-ku 𓃶𓆛 "mystical Goat-fish"
Aquarius ♒ 𒀯𒄖𒆷 mul-gu-la "Great One" 𒄖 ᴬGUʳᵃ Aquarius ᴬGUˡᵃ Eagle
Pisces ♓ 𒀯𒉆𒄷𒈤 mul.sim-mušen.MAḪᴬ "Great Swallowˢ" Dove Tails
